body: What if there is an alien civilization that has only one gender.

NASA can never be trusted. First they hide the flat Earth, now they're hiding the futa-aliens! Those bastards always try to make us believe the lies they're telling so the Jews patrolling the Antarctic Ring will keep making money to fund NASA. We shall no longer fall for their lies! WAKE UP SHEEPLE!
I'll bet NASA knew all along.
